problem.p: If Owl places the library lower in the tree it will reduce the length (or height) of the ‘column.’ How will this affect the compressive stress in the tree?

choicegroup.label: If Owl places the library lower in the tree it will reduce the length (or height) of the ‘column.’ How will this affect the compressive stress in the tree?
choicegroup.choice: The compressive stress will NOT change.

div.p: The compressive stress is a function of the material and cross-sectional only, not a function of the length (or height) of the column. The buckling load will be affected by the length but not the compressive stress.
